art_piece_monalisa.title: Mona Lisa
art_piece_monalisa.description: One of the most famous portraits in the world, known for the subject's enigmatic expression.

art_piece_wheatfield.title: Wheat Field with Crows
art_piece_wheatfield.description: A haunting and dramatic painting of a wheat field under a stormy sky, possibly van Gogh's last work.

art_piece_thekiss.title: The Kiss
art_piece_thekiss.description: A symbol of love and intimacy, this golden artwork blends Art Nouveau and Symbolism.

art_piece_starwars.title: Star Wars Poster
art_piece_starwars.description: An iconic poster celebrating the legendary sci-fi saga that redefined cinema.

art_piece_pearlearring.title: Girl with a Pearl Earring
art_piece_pearlearring.description: Often called the 'Mona Lisa of the North', this painting captures a mysterious young woman wearing a pearl earring.

art_piece_starrynight.title: Starry Night
art_piece_starrynight.description: A swirling night sky over a quiet town, painted during Van Gogh’s stay at a mental asylum in Saint-Rémy.

art_piece_waveoffkanagawa.title: The Great Wave off Kanagawa
art_piece_waveoffkanagawa.description: A legendary woodblock print capturing a massive wave threatening boats near Mount Fuji.
